auditModules.name: Content Quality & Relevance
auditModules.description: Evaluates content depth, topical authority, and AI-detection readiness
keyInsights: 78% of core landing pages exceed 2,000 words
Topical authority strong in 5 of 8 key verticals

issues.title: Thin content on product comparison pages
issues.description: 3 product comparison pages fall below 1,000 words, reducing topical depth
issues.impact: Reduced keyword coverage on high-intent queries

issues.title: Missing schema markup on blog posts
issues.description: Blog content lacks Article schema, limiting rich snippet eligibility
issues.impact: Lost CTR from rich snippets in SERPs

recommendations.title: Expand comparison page content
recommendations.description: Add technical specifications, use-case breakdowns, and ROI analysis to comparison pages

recommendations.title: Implement Article schema on blog
recommendations.description: Add structured data to enable rich snippets for blog content
recommendations.estimatedImpact: 10-20% CTR improvement on blog search results

auditModules.name: E-E-A-T & Trust Signals
auditModules.description: Analyzes Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals
keyInsights: Author bios present on 95% of content
Brand mentions in authoritative sources: 127 in past 90 days

issues.title: Limited author expertise depth
issues.description: Author credentials lack quantifiable achievements or certifications

recommendations.title: Expand author credentials
recommendations.description: Add achievement counts, certifications, and speaking experience to author bios

auditModules.name: Technical SEO & Core Web Vitals
auditModules.description: Validates Core Web Vitals, crawlability, and technical implementation

issues.title: Elevated First Input Delay
issues.description: FID consistently above 80ms on mobile, particularly on homepage
issues.impact: Potential ranking penalty and reduced Core Web Vitals score

issues.title: Missing XML sitemaps for section pages

recommendations.title: Optimize JavaScript execution
recommendations.description: Defer non-critical JS, implement code splitting, and reduce main thread blocking

recommendations.title: Generate section-level sitemaps
recommendations.description: Create XML sitemaps for each subsection and link from main sitemap

auditModules.name: Keyword Strategy & Coverage
auditModules.description: Analyzes keyword targeting, coverage gaps, and competitive positioning
keyInsights: Competitive keyword overlap: 34% with top 3 competitors

issues.title: Keyword cannibalization on 8 topics
issues.description: Multiple pages competing for same primary keywords

recommendations.title: Consolidate cannibalized content
recommendations.description: Merge or restructure pages to create clear keyword hierarchy
recommendations.estimatedImpact: +12% average position improvement on affected keywords

auditModules.name: Structured Data & Schema
auditModules.description: Audits schema markup implementation and rich snippet eligibility
keyInsights: Schema markup coverage: 52% of eligible pages

issues.title: Missing Product schema on product pages
issues.description: 32 product pages lack Product schema markup
issues.impact: Lost rich snippet opportunities for product details

issues.title: Incorrect BreadcrumbList structure
issues.description: Breadcrumb schema on 18 pages has incorrect position values

recommendations.title: Implement Product schema
recommendations.description: Add Product schema with price, rating, and availability to all product pages
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Enable rich snippets showing price and ratings

auditModules.name: Link Profile & Authority
auditModules.description: Evaluates backlink quality, diversity, and authority signals
keyInsights: Referring domains trend: +12 in past 30 days

issues.title: 6 low-quality links from unrelated sites
issues.description: Links from directories and low-authority sites with no topical relevance

recommendations.title: Disavow low-quality links
recommendations.description: Create disavow file and submit to Google Search Console

auditModules.name: Search Intent & Alignment
auditModules.description: Analyzes content alignment with user search intent and SERP patterns
keyInsights: 82% of content aligns with primary search intent
Search intent distribution: Informational 45%, Commercial 35%, Transactional 20%
SERP feature presence: 56% of tracked keywords have rich snippets

issues.title: Misaligned content on 5 high-value keywords
issues.description: Content written for informational intent but user searches show commercial intent
issues.impact: High bounce rate on these pages

recommendations.title: Reformat content for commercial intent
recommendations.description: Add comparison tables, pricing information, and CTA elements to misaligned pages
